alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; McClain; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Garvin, southeastern Oklahoma, eastern Cleveland, Pottawatomie and southeastern McClain Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 915 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dale to near Brooksville to 3 miles east of Rosedale to near Antioch. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Shawnee, Tecumseh, Pauls Valley, McLoud, Pink, Maysville, Wayne, Paoli, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Byars, Johnson, St. Louis, Etowah, Rosedale, Brooksville, Macomb, and Newalla. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 68 and 85. Interstate 40 between mile markers 169 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
